plot: Chelsea Stevens is a neurotic, egocentric Martha Stewart-type who finds herself reluctantly answering to naive Midwesterner Jane Sokol after her empire is bought out by another company.

cast.name: Matt Sergott
cast.role: Dancer in filmed weekly opening sequence

title: Style & Substance
